languages.text: "Вот как". {n}Ксавьер Калькасар бросает насмешливый взгляд на дознавателя.{/n} "Как думаешь, о чем это {mf|он|она}?"

traits.locale_text: "Вот как". {n}Ксавьер Калькасар бросает насмешливый взгляд на дознавателя.{/n} "Хейнрикс, как думаешь, о чем это {mf|он|она}?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: "Indeed?" {n}Xavier Calcazar shoots the Interrogator an amused look.{/n} "What do you think {mf|he|she} is talking about?"
languages.original_text: "Вот как". {n}Ксавьер Калькасар бросает насмешливый взгляд на дознавателя.{/n} "Как думаешь, о чем это {mf|он|она}?"

traits.locale_text: "You don't say." {n}Xavier Calcazar shoots the Interrogator an amused look.{/n} "Heinrix, what do you think {mf|he|she} is talking about?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

traits.locale_text: "Indeed?" {n}Xavier Calcazar shoots the Interrogator an amused look.{/n} "What do you think {mf|he|she} is talking about?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: « Allons bon... {n}dit Xavier Calcazar en lançant un regard amusé à l'interrogateur.{/n} De quoi parle-t-{mf|il|elle}, à votre avis ? »
languages.original_text: "Indeed?" {n}Xavier Calcazar shoots the Interrogator an amused look.{/n} "What do you think {mf|he|she} is talking about?"

traits.locale_text: « Voyez-vous ça ? {n}dit Xavier Calcazar en lançant un regard amusé à l'interrogateur.{/n} Heinrix, de quoi parle-t-{mf|il|elle}, à votre avis ? »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: “没错吧？”{n}希维尔·卡尔卡扎朝海因里希投去了揶揄的眼神。{/n}“对于{mf|他|她}的证词，你是怎么想的呢？”
languages.original_text: "Indeed?" {n}Xavier Calcazar shoots the Interrogator an amused look.{/n} "What do you think {mf|he|she} is talking about?"

traits.locale_text: “肯定有效。”{n}希维尔·卡尔卡扎朝海因里希投去了揶揄的眼神。{/n}“对于{mf|他|她}的证词，你是怎么想的呢，海因里希？”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: 「確かに」{n}ザビエル・カルカサルはインテロゲイターを面白そうに見た。{/n}「あなたは{mf|彼|彼女}が何の話をしていると思うのだ？」
languages.original_text: "Indeed?" {n}Xavier Calcazar shoots the Interrogator an amused look.{/n} "What do you think {mf|he|she} is talking about?"

traits.locale_text: 「確かに」{n}ザビエル・カルカサルはインテロゲイターを面白そうに見た。{/n}「あなたは{mf|彼|彼女}が何の話をしていると思うのだ？」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: "Tatsächlich?" {n}Xavier Calcazar blickt den Interrogator amüsiert an.{/n} "Was meint Ihr, wovon spricht {mf|er|sie}?"
languages.original_text: "Indeed?" {n}Xavier Calcazar shoots the Interrogator an amused look.{/n} "What do you think {mf|he|she} is talking about?"

traits.locale_text: "Was Ihr nicht sagt." {n}Xavier Calcazar blickt den Interrogator amüsiert an.{/n} "Heinrix, was meint Ihr, wovon spricht {mf|er|sie}?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: «¿De verdad?». {n}Xavier Calcazar mira al interrogador con gesto risueño.{/n} «¿De qué crees tú que está hablando?».
languages.original_text: "Indeed?" {n}Xavier Calcazar shoots the Interrogator an amused look.{/n} "What do you think {mf|he|she} is talking about?"

traits.locale_text: «No me digas». {n}Xavier Calcazar mira al interrogador con gesto risueño.{/n} «Heinrix, ¿de qué crees tú que está hablando?».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: "Öyle mi?" {n}Xavier Calcazar, Sorgucu'ya keyifli olduğunu belli eden bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Sence neden bahsediyor?"
languages.original_text: "Indeed?" {n}Xavier Calcazar shoots the Interrogator an amused look.{/n} "What do you think {mf|he|she} is talking about?"

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi?" {n}Xavier Calcazar, Sorgucu'ya keyifli olduğunu belli eden bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Sence neyden bahsediyor?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar
